scripts.product: cd frontend; yarn build; cd ../backend; node ./bin/www.js
cd frontend; npm run build; cd ../backend; node app.js
scripts.postinstall: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.importdata: mongoimport -d pocketrecipe -c user --file ./data/user.json --drop --jsonArray && mongoimport -d pocketrecipe -c recipe --file ./data/recipe.json --drop --jsonArray
